title: Recognising excellence of our future teachers (Cape Peninsula University of Technology)
text: ( Source : Cape Peninsula University of Technology ) Students in the Department of Further Education and Training who distinguished themselves with academic excellence in 2014 were recognized this week at an Excellence Awards ceremony held at
